page.title: 09HOUSING 04160531
page.content: Our block has only 4 medium-sized villages. {HUNWICK:}New Hunwick consists mainly of terraces.Old Hunwick earns its name from its old stone cottages.However, there are now 3 modern housing estates in addition-one council-owned and 2 private.New houses have been built beside the older ones at different times in the past. {HOWDEN}is the largest village in our block.There are lots of terraced houses which are built of brick.There are 7 housing estates _all of them built in the last 30 years.There are 4 private estates and 3 council-owned ones. {NORTH BITCHBURN}consists of 3 rows of mining terraces. {HIGH GRANGE}is another ex-mining village,made up of 2 long rows of houses with small gardens.
